alert.note: Alert for Dillon; Marlboro (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 6:59PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Dillon and east central Marlboro Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 658 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bennettsville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bennettsville, Mccoll, Clio, Dunbar, Minturn, Blenheim and Tatum. An automated weather station just east of Bennettsville recorded a wind gust to 35 mph at 654 pm. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
